description.content: Authentication APIs
Authenticate admin with username and password.
Register a new admin account (testing only).
Authenticate user with identifier and birth date.
Authenticate teacher with code and password.
Invalidate current authentication token.
Get new access token using refresh token.
Reset admin password using a reset token.
Admin APIs
Requires admin access token with write access. Creates an admin.
Requires admin access token. Get admins.
Requires admin access token. Get admin by id.
Requires admin access token with write access. Update admin.
Requires admin access token with write access. Delete admin.

item.name: Generates password reset link for an admin user with id {id}.

request.name: Generates password reset link for an admin user with id {id}.

description.content: Requires admin access token. generates reset password link.
Requires admin access token with write access. Create a teacher.
Requires admin access token with write access. Get teachers.
Requires admin access token with write access. Get teacher by id.
Requires admin access token with write access. Update teacher.
Requires admin access token with write access. Delete teacher by id.
Requires admin access token with write access.
Requires admin access token with write access. Create user.
Requires admin access token with write access. Get user.
Requires admin access token with write access. Get user by id.
Requires admin access token with write access. Update user.
Requires admin access token with write access. Delete user by id.
Requires admin access token. Updates a group.
Requires admin access token. Get groups. Supports pagination.
Requires admin access token. Gets a group by id.
Requires admin access token. Updates a group.
Requires admin access token. Deletes a group by id.

item.name: Gets a list of a user groups.

request.name: Gets a list of a user groups.

description.content: Requires admin access token. Gets a list of a user groups.

item.name: Enrolls a user to a group.

request.name: Enrolls a user to a group.

description.content: Requires admin access token. Enrolls a user to a group.
Creates card for user.

item.name: Get user last card by userId.

request.name: Get user last card by userId.

description.content: Get user last card by userId. null is returned if there is no card.
Requires admin access token with write access. Creates a new competition.
Requires admin access token. Get competitions.
Requires admin access token. Get competition by id.
Requires admin access token with write access. Update competition.
Requires admin access token with write access. Delete competition.
Requires admin access token with write access. Creates a new competition registration.
Requires admin access token. Get competition registrations.
Requires admin access token. Get competition registration by id.
Requires admin access token with write access. Update competition registration.
Requires admin access token with write access. Delete competition registration.
User APIs
Requires user access token. Updates the user.
Teacher APIs
Requires teacher access token. Updates the teacher.
Requires teacher access token. Returns a list of teacher groups. Supports pagination parameters.
